message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $11,500.  It's a great deal, and I'm confident it will be worth it to you. Let me know what you think!
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to sell the product. I would like to counteroffer at $10,000 for the product.

Bob, I understand you're looking for a good price, but $10,000 is simply too low for me.  I'm willing to come down a bit further, but I need to make sure I'm getting a fair deal.  How about $11,000?  This is my final offer.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Considering your final offer of $11,000, I would like to counteroffer at $10,500 for the product.
Bob, I'm getting the feeling we're not going to agree.  I'm willing to go down to $10,800. This is really my final offer. If you're not willing to meet me there, I'll have to move on.
Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate your flexibility. Given your last offer of $10,800, I would like to counteroffer at $10,600 for the product.

Bob, I'm starting to feel like we're going in circles here.  I'm willing to meet you halfway on this last offer and go down to $10,700.  If you don't accept this, I'll be forced to move on to another buyer.
Alice, thank you for considering my needs. I appreciate your effort in coming down to $10,700. In light of this, I would like to counteroffer at $10,650 for the product.
